title: A Symbolic Structure for the 4 P's of Knowing - Andrew Algra
description:
Andrew has put much thoughtful consideration into his symbolic synthesis of Corner Content into this "Map of Meaning" of TLC

Andrew's Twitter: @AndrewAlgra
